Uses of Package
org.infinispan.xsite.status

Packages that use org.infinispan.xsite.status
Package
Description
org.infinispan.factories
Factories are internal components used to create other components based on a cache's configuration.
org.infinispan.xsite.status
 
  • Classes in org.infinispan.xsite.status used by org.infinispan.factories
    Class
    Description
    TakeOfflineManager
    It keeps tracks of cross-site requests to take sites offline when certain failures conditions happen.
  • Classes in org.infinispan.xsite.status used by org.infinispan.xsite.status
    Class
    Description
    AbstractMixedSiteStatus
    Abstract class to create mixed SiteStatus.
    AbstractSiteStatusBuilder
    A SiteStatus builder based on its online and offline members.
    BringSiteOnlineResponse
    The return value of TakeOfflineManager.bringSiteOnline(String).
    NoOpTakeOfflineManager
    An empty TakeOfflineManager implementation for caches which don't backup any data to remote sites.
    OfflineSiteStatus
    SiteStatus implementation for offline sites.
    OnlineSiteStatus
    SiteStatus implementation for online sites.
    SiteState
    The site state.
    SiteStatus
    A site status.
    TakeOfflineManager
    It keeps tracks of cross-site requests to take sites offline when certain failures conditions happen.
    TakeSiteOfflineResponse
    The return value of TakeOfflineManager.takeSiteOffline(String).
